# Smartleaf Inc.

**Website:** https://www.smartleaf.com  
**Category:** Portfolio Rebalancing & Tax Optimization Software  
**Status:** Active  
**Verified:** 2026-02-12

## Company Overview

Smartleaf Inc. is an automated portfolio rebalancing platform designed to deliver exceptional tax-optimized management and customizations at scale for wealth management firms.

**Headquarters:** One Bowdoin Square, 10th Floor, Boston, MA 02114

## Contact Information

- **Phone:** 617-453-0714
- **Fax:** 617-491-5556
- **Email:** sales@smartleafam.com (via subsidiary Smartleaf Asset Management)
- **Website:** https://www.smartleaf.com
- **Support Portal:** Contact form available at https://www.smartleaf.com/contact-us

## Product Description

Smartleaf provides wealth management firms with:

- **Automated Portfolio Rebalancing:** Daily rebalancing workflow across all accounts
- **Tax-Optimized Management:** Saves clients an average of 3.20% of portfolio value in taxes (2021 data)
- **Direct Indexing:** Simplified direct index management (as easy as ETFs)
- **Unlimited Customization:** Highly personalized portfolios for every client size
- **Zero Advisor Time:** Automated rebalancing and trading, freeing advisors from manual work

## Subsidiary

**Smartleaf Asset Management (SAM)** - RIA subsidiary that can take responsibility for portfolio review, rebalancing, and trading while leaving advisors in control of investment policy and personalization.

## Pricing Tiers

**Enterprise Pricing Model:**
- **Pricing Structure:** Based on Assets Under Management (AUM)
- **Calculation:** Greater of firm-wide minimum or basis-point fees
- **Contact for Pricing:** Custom enterprise quotes required

**Third-Party Model Fees:**
- **Alpha Vee Direct Index Models:** Starting at 5 bps, lowering to 3 bps at volume
- **Model Distribution Service:** Pass-through at cost plus modest serving fee

**Notes:**
- Pricing scales with AUM
- Enterprise-only offering (no self-service tiers)
- Free trial/demo available upon request
- No public pricing disclosed

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities

**Automated Portfolio Management:**
- Daily automated rebalancing workflow across all accounts
- Whole-portfolio holistic analytics (not sub-account/sleeved)
- Non-command-based system (acts like automated assistant)
- Zero time spent by client-facing advisors on rebalancing/trading
- Standardized, uniform daily rebalancing workflow

**Tax Optimization:**
- Year-round tax loss harvesting
- Tax-sensitive transition planning (multi-year)
- Wash sale prevention
- Short-term gains avoidance
- Long-term gain deferral (risk-appropriate)
- Tax budgets and caps
- Optimal tax lot selection
- Average tax savings: 3.20% of portfolio value (2021 data)
- Automated tax savings reports for each client

**Direct Indexing:**
- Direct indexes as easy to manage as ETFs
- Fractional share support
- No separate SMA account opening/closing
- Single pull-down menu for ETF-to-direct-index replacement
- Automated implementation of customization and tax preferences
- Available for all client sizes

### Advanced Features

**Customization & Personalization:**
- Menu-driven customization (no ad hoc trade decisions)
- Custom asset allocations
- Custom product selection
- Security-level constraints (never buy/never sell)
- Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) screens
- Religious values constraints
- Sector constraints
- Minimum trade size settings

**Model Distribution Service (MDS):**
- Asset allocation model updates
- Security model updates
- Alternate product choices
- Access to third-party investment models
- Open architecture support
- Easy integration of proprietary and third-party models

**Advanced Householding:**
- Multiple accounts managed jointly to common target
- Tax-deferred accounts as tax-free rebalancing centers
- Tax sensitivity across household
- Wash sale prevention across accounts
- Trading and turnover optimization

**Cash Management:**
- Minimum cash thresholds
- Maximum cash limits
- Regularly scheduled withdrawals
- Overdraft prevention
- Reserve cash allocation
- "Accumulate cash" feature

**Compliance & Documentation:**
- Built-in compliance features
- Automated capture of client customization criteria
- Documentation of daily portfolio reviews
- Explanation of individual trades
- Demonstration of advisor value

### Enterprise-Only Features

- **Role-Based Workflows:** Separate portals for advisors, investment policy committee (IPC), and central rebalancing group
- **Advisor Portal:** Real-time feedback on tax and risk implications of customization
- **Investment Policy Committee (IPC) Controls:** Default asset allocations, product choices, compliant boundaries
- **Central Rebalancing Group Tools:** Automated review and trade suggestion system
- **Enterprise Integrations:** Daily data uploads, trade file exports to trade management systems
- **Disaster Recovery:** Full disaster recovery capability (hosted service)

### Limitations

- **Enterprise-Only:** Not available for individual advisors or small practices
- **No Self-Service:** Requires implementation and onboarding
- **Not for Security Traders:** Not designed for firms focused on individual security trade conversations
- **Not Command-Based:** Different workflow from traditional rebalancing systems
- **No Public Pricing:** Must contact sales for pricing information
- **Integration Required:** Requires daily data feeds from system of record

## Notes

- Platform runs daily rebalancing workflows
- Manages $50+ billion in AUM (as of 2025 data)
- 40+ enterprise customers
- Focus on tax optimization and demonstrating advisor value through tax savings reports
- Hosted SaaS solution (no on-premise installation)
- Non-invasive implementation
